name: Hoppy Goat
description:
♈Play the newest casual platform game on Android for FREE! ♈

♈How many jumps can you do? ♈How many cakes can you eat?! ♈

♈Play as a funny little goat, challenging the Olympic records for hops! Hopping between the endless amount of sweetness mountains and eating the most delicious angel cakes! Help the little goat succeed to be the best hopper in the endless world! ♈Happy hopping! ♈

♈♈♈Great Features ♈♈♈

♈Smooth performance!
♈Simple one touch controls!
♈Free to play!
♈Adorable art style!
♈Tap and hold on the screen to make the goat jump!
♈Jump continuously to get more points along the journey!
♈Eat Angel Cake for extra points!
♈Leaderboards for best hopper and most continuous hops!
♈Compete with friends!
♈Be the best!

♈Download Hoppy Goat now for FREE and become the best hopper in the world! ♈

♈Let your friends know and compete with each other to see who is the best! ♈

♈More news in the future! ♈
